name: Nemesis (itch) (DeadPixel)
description:
Nemesis is a physics-based game where you play the role of a malevolent, sentient planet hellbent on destroying every solar system in the known galaxy.

Using the awesome power of gravity, you are able to suck planets out of their orbit around the sun and tether them to yourself. Once tethered you are free to swing, smash, bash, crash and fling the planets into each other until nothing is left but dust.

CONTROLS

Using your mouse click and hold to move the planet Nemesis in the direction you're pointing.

Click and hold on a planet to tether it to yourself.

While tethered move your mouse in circles to swing the planet and bash it into others, dealing damage.

Once planets sustain enough damage they will explode and send fragments of their shattered existence flying into space!

Careful not to ram into planets (or the sun!). They hurt.

REQUIREMENTS

  • Java 6+
  • OpenGL 2.0+ compatible graphics card
